title: Hollyoaks: Lindsey and Kim Butterfield are Gloved Hand Killer favourites as reveal day arrives - Hollyoaks Soaps -
text: With the Hollyoaks Gloved Hand Killer reveal now just hours away, Lindsey and Kim Butterfield have emerged as the two fan favourites to be unmasked as the evil culprit.Thousands of fans have taken part in Digital Spy's Gloved Hand poll in the past two days and it's Lindsey who's surged ahead with 50% of the votes. © Lime PicturesSophie Austin as Lindsey Butterfield The nearest suspect is Lindsey's unstable sister Kim with 16%, while sixth former Holly Cunningham is a close third with 14% after fans noticed that she was lurking at the hospital when several of the murders took place.Nice girl Celine McQueen is in fourth spot with 10%, while 7% of voters were optimistic over a shock return by picking serial killer Silas Blissett - who hasn't been seen on our screens since 2012.She may not be whiter than white in her personal life, but most fans appear to have ruled Tegan Lomax out of the mystery as she only pulled in 3% of the votes.Hollyoaks has been running the Gloved Hand Killer storyline since January, when the ruthless villain gave Rick Spencer a lethal injection at the hospital. Since then, the same treatment has been dished out to Will Savage, Mariam Andrews, Phoebe McQueen, Dylan Jenkins, Ashley Davidson and Dr S'Avage. © Lime PicturesKim embarks on a cover-up Tuesday's E4 first look episode strongly suggested that Kim is the culprit as she sabotaged DS Thorpe's attempts to investigate the Gloved Hand mystery, but was she protecting herself or one of her colleagues?All will be revealed at 7pm tonight as the latest E4 airing sees the Gloved Hand Killer claim their third victim of the week and be officially unmasked for the first time.Hollyoaks is celebrating its 20th anniversary all this week on Channel 4 and E4.Hollyoaks 20th anniversary spoilers: The Gloved Hand Killer will strike three timesHollyoaks 20th anniversary: We rank the Gloved Hand Killer suspects as the big reveal gets closerHollyoaks boss Bryan Kirkwood: 'We've always known who the Gloved Hand Killer was'UK TV ratings: Hollyoaks hits nine-month high on E4 with Roscoe stunt scenesHollyoaks 20th anniversary: Kim Butterfield is at the centre of a Gloved Hand Killer cover-upRead more Hollyoaks spoilers and newsDigital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on EastEnders' Halloween special, Nikhil's Emmerdale return, the Nightingale family's arrival in Hollyoaks and a new romance story for Mary in Coronation Street. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID);
